phrases: Seems like you do not have a fever.
I found someone special to me.
Akane-chan from Katchu Ranbu, Kachu Rabu for short!
The anime just started, but the first second I saw him, I was like,
I looked it up, saved tons of pics,
and I have not slept at all, but I feel great!
That is what I thought you would say.
I have already made him into the wallpaper for my phone.
I am not following in the slightest.
Akane-chan's like, the main character's retainer,
but he really likes the main character, his lord.
But there is also a childhood friend he cannot get along with,
who is younger and acts as a big rival,
and a teacher that he totally admires!
But right now, Akane-chan's definitely in the lead!
The moment I saw it, my entire soul trembled!
Shion's in the hall of fame.
Anyway, Akane-chan just loves his lord!
I cannot get enough of how much he calls for his lord!
Uh, so what exactly is this Kachu Rabu part?
Word from the northern mountains: The enemy has attacked!
There is bowmen waiting to ambush you outside!
With my entire body and soul.
Even if it costs me my life!
It is so amazing, it hurts!
Uh, Akane is the redhead, right?
Where did he go halfway through?
He disappeared after he hugged that guy.
Well, katchu means armor and helmet.
Akane-chan is his lord's exclusive armor and helmet,
so when they enter battle, he transforms.
This is in the Sengoku Period, right?
So, he is an anthropomorphized helmet and armor, right?
It means to make various objects into humans.
Like countries, prefectures, battleships, household appliances, or trains.
Is there something it has not been done to?
What is special about Kachu Rabu is that the armor and the lord are a set, right?
The lord's personality with the special addition of the armor!
No one can get between them!
If you paid attention, you would see it is Akane x Lord, no question.
Did you even read the opening and ending themes' lyrics?
However you interpret them, it is Lord x Akane.
No, no, there is no way!
A follower obviously entrusts all to his lord!
And it is because of that that he can devote his body and soul to him!
Embracing all of his lord is why he can lay himself bare.
It is because he can lay himself bare that he can open his legs!
As this scene is unsightly, please stand by.
He can accept all of his lord's hardships, both emotionally and physically!
Speaking of physical, the lord's body is definitely that of a bottom!
H-Hold on, you two, calm down.
That was Nishina-san, was not it?
You are not going to say hi?
Why is it Akane x Lord?
They seriously do not get it!
Kae-chan and Nishina-san would not even look at each other just now.
actually, we do not really get it ourselves.
Things might be through between those two.
This is a reverse shipping war!
Reverse ship is short for a reversed relationship.
It means exactly what it sounds like: the pitcher and catcher are in reversed roles.
You mean like the roles in baseball?
You do not even know that?!
What would you two do if you two were going out?
Would Nanashima be the one who asks Igarashi out, or the reverse?
It changes the flow of the relationship completely!
By the way, I am totally 7 x 5.
So, you are telling me those two are fighting over this?
Which character holds the reins in a romantic relationship is a huge issue.
Especially in the world of fujoshi,
this kind of thing often sparks a battle.
A rift in shipping is a rift in your friendship!
The passion is nearly synonymous with what you would feel avenging your parent's death!
They might not make up while they have got Kachu Rabu fever.
Kae-chan never gave an inch on the 5 x 7 x 5 thing, either.
They used to get along so well, though...
Nishina-san is not coming today, either, huh?
They are still going at it.
Guess we have got to do something.
You are going to Anime Ito?
I am interested in anything related to the Sengoku period.
I would like to see Kachu Rabu.
I was thinking of looking at some goods.
Will you show me what is good?
What interest do you have in Anime Ito, Igarashi-senpai?
It would be embarrassing if Nana and I went alone.
But why are you even going at all?
I thought it would be nice to get Serinuma-san anime goods as a present.
Why would I help you two score points with her?
I am not cooperating with my rivals.
Will you be happy if I just go?
Also, do not click your tongue at your senpai.
This guy actually has a pretty rotten personality.
Are all of you shopping, too?
Let us not waste this, and get some tea!
Ha ha, do not forget the senpai.
so let us all have a fun time chatting!
Even if that is what they want to do...
I saw that Kachu Rabu thing!
I thought it would be really girly, but it is got lots guys would like, too!
It was more fun because it was so unexpected.
The fight scenes were great, too.
The armor and helmet designs were novel, too.
The director is an authority on action scenes,
so it was as great as we would hoped!
That Princess Mitsu was pretty cute, too.
She was courageous, was not she?
And the way she acts just a bit cold just adds to her charm!
She is probably going to end up with the lord by the end.
Th-The lord really treasures him, too.
I googled it, and it looks like that pair is the most popular.
You mean Akane x Lord, right?
You mean Lord x Akane, right?
You are still going on about that crap, Senpai?
That is what I want to say to you.
It is time to get to the bottom of this!
We will post fanfiction we write based on Kachu Rabu to the same site!
The one with more hits is the one we will accept as the true pairing!
I could not ask for more!
The format will be a short story!
We will both upload our work next week, Sunday at midnight!
This is getting worse and worse.
I have no intention of backing down.
I will show her what side justice is on!
You might never be friends again.
Well, it is pretty convenient for me, anyway.
One less person to get in the way.
You should always have conviction, after all.
I have told you over and over, do not forget the senpai!
I like things that are beautiful.
I liked looking at beautiful things,
then drawing them or making them.
Nothing less from the daughter of the Nishina family.
She is the young lady from the Nishina Group, right?
She is from a different world.
It is good, but it is pretty normal.
But, it is probably her family...
I hear her family gives lots of donations to our school.
Oh, so that is what this is all about.
But, the way I keep losing is not beautiful, either!
I paved my own way to my place in the world,
so I cannot lose this fight!
Are you getting enough sleep, Serinuma-san?
I am so worried about my fanfiction.
I have thought about it too much.
I cannot tell if it is good or not anymore.
Could you read it for me?
The concept's good, and you have got a good grasp of it.
I think you should make it clear whether it is first person or third person.
Also, it is not very clear who is saying what line.
He is telling her things an elementary school kid learns about writing.
Is she going to be okay?
Serinuma-senpai is having a really hard time with it.
I cannot stand to see her like that.
Plus, you have experience in making books.
The skill gap is too big.
This is all a waste of time.
This is a battle between souls.
Akane is not beautiful as a catcher.
That is what my soul is crying out!
So I will never back down!
If you do not understand what is going on, then just shut up, little kitten.
A boy's being pressed up against the wall!
Got pressed up against the wall by your crotch in public
where everyone could see, and ran away.
Th-The same thing would happen to you!
What does she mean by this it is not beautiful thing?
If you ask me, neither option is beautiful.
And so, their writing from their souls continued,
Then the winner is based on the number of hits.
Both of them are going up.
And so, the decisive moment came...
This is proof that I was right!
Now, let me hear you admit you have lost, Senpai.
I will not give up my pairing!
Is not it great that your justice won in the end?
What are you trying to say?
You once told me that you like beautiful things.
Is making the girl you like cry beautiful?
It was here, was not it?
This is the school I chose for myself.
I will make a place for myself in this world!
Oh, right, I heard a super rich girl was coming to our school.
What, why would someone like that come to a plain public school like ours?
This is no different than how things were before!
That was a beautiful flying body attack, my lady.
This is the first doujinshi I have made.
I wonder if I will be big one day.
It is hard to get a sale.
I would like everything from here to here.
Um, would you mind telling me your
Round Triangle-san has started selling copies of her books!
I am happy I could sell a few issues.
I got a message from the mail form.
Today, I bought all of your books.
No, those words are not enough to express how good they were.
It was like my soul was trembling!
And so, I started looking for her around school.
But I was not able to find her.
I became absorbed in my writing.
My circle started getting bigger and bigger.
And then, that day, I was reunited with her without even knowing it.
Oh, it is Serinuma-san from year two!
I hear she is a huge otaku, though.
If she is this cute, it does not matter.
But just a little while ago, she was a huge fatty!
This girl, and that girl, are one in the same?!
I do not want to lose her over something like this!
There is nothing more precious to me than her!
Erry's in front of the station
You may have lost the duel, but that story was pretty good!
I still love the stories Shima-chan writes!
I love your storyI love you!
So we are done with all that shipping stuff, right?
About that, I have an idea.
The lord and Akane-chan are versatile!
That is why you are my soulmate!
Versatile apparently refers to a pairing in which
both players can be the catcher or pitcher.
I thought it was rare to see you in sneakers.
Also, I kind of collect them.
Do not you think when a man starts collecting things, it quickly gets out of hand?
It is just a small collection.
If we are talking out of hand, your room is something else.
It was like an exhibition hall of plastic models.
Compared to other points in my life, it is actually pretty tame.
Next time: On A Journey to the Holy Land of Kachu Rabu
It was really bad when I did not buy shel
